channel.title: Connecting the world of sailing, fishing and boating
channel.description: Connecting the world of sailing, fishing and boating

item.title: CharterLink Auckland Bareboat Yachts
item.description:
CharterLink Auckland Bareboat Yachts

Sailing Holiday in the world's finest cruising ground! Charter a luxurious, modern yacht or sailing catamaran, and take yourself sailing to the islands, beaches and anchorages of Auckland's amazing Hauraki Gulf.

item.title: No title
item.description: Welcome - this is designed to enable a community of yachting, boating and fishing to share their assets
